description: Enjoy ATSC TV and Clear QAM on your PC or laptop with high definition up to 1920 x 1080iYou can watch and record ATSC TV, 8VSB TV, and Clear QAM on your PC or laptop with this TV tuner stick. Furthermore, this TV tuner not only offers multiple TV signal receptions but also delivers high definition picture up to 1920 x 1080i which allows viewers to enjoy a superior visual quality. Once you captured the videos, you can edit and put your creativity to work with the CyberLink software. Afterward, you can either upload your videos directly into YouTube or burn them into DVD with DVD menu. You can even convert your production into other formats, in order to be watched in your iPod, PSP, or any of your small mobile device.
title: Kworld USB ATSC TV Tuner TV Tuners and Video Capture UB435-Q
